And, living up to expectations, Silence Suzuka quickly 
runs through and takes the front!

Further, Silence Suzuka doesn't slow down! No, 
accelerating even more, she increases her lead!

Look at Silence Suzuka go! Now she's passing the 1000m 
mark!

Just how far will she extend her lead!? How quickly will 
she cross the finish line?!

Silence Suzuka runs in the lead! Now she's heading 
around behind the big Zelkova tree!
